LabelText: Document the alert or observation that indicated possible privilege escalation
Identify the user or service account whose privileges appear to have changed
Review recent role or group membership changes for the account
Determine whether the privilege change followed an approved change request
Review authentication logs for suspicious logins related to the account
Revoke or adjust the elevated privileges to the minimum required level
Check for additional accounts with similar unauthorized privilege changes
Document root cause, affected resources, and corrective actions
